Title: Creates the rescued animals spay and neuter fund
Summary: Creates the rescued animals spay and neuter fund; authorizes the department of taxation and finance to place a check-off box on income tax returns for taxpayers to contribute money to the fund.
LawCode: Add §§209-P & 630-k, Tax L; add §95-k, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to the rescued animals spay and neuter fund
